title: Loyalty Details
description: Loyalty details such as ID, points, join date, program, and status.

xdm:loyalty.description: Captures details related to the customer's loyalty rewards.

xdm:joinDate.title: Program Join Date
xdm:joinDate.description: Date which the visitor registered for the loyalty program.

xdm:loyaltyID.title: Program ID
xdm:loyaltyID.description: The loyalty program ID(s) associated with a specific user, if they are enrolled in the client's loyalty program.

xdm:points.title: Program Points Balance
xdm:points.description: Current balance of the loyalty points/awards in a visitor's loyalty account.

xdm:pointsExpiring.title: Points Expiring
xdm:pointsExpiring.description: Point balance expiring as of the associated expiration date.

xdm:pointsExpirationDate.description: Date on which the given portion of the loyalty points expire.

xdm:pointsRedeemed.title: Points Redeemed
xdm:pointsRedeemed.description: Amount of points applied toward a purchase or otherwise redeemed.

xdm:program.title: Program Name
xdm:program.description: This should define the loyalty progam in which a visitor is enrolled.

xdm:upgradeDate.title: Upgrade Date
xdm:upgradeDate.description: Date which the customer was upgraded to the next tier level.

xdm:status.title: Status
xdm:status.description: Captures the visitor's loyalty progam status, such as active, disabled, or suspended.

xdm:tier.title: Tier
xdm:tier.description: Captures the loyalty progam tier in which a visitor is enrolled.

xdm:tierExpiryDate.title: Tier Expiry Date
xdm:tierExpiryDate.description: Date when the customer's current loyalty tier expires.

xdm:adjustedPoints.title: Adjusted Points
xdm:adjustedPoints.description: Points that have been adjusted due to corrections, returns, or other modifications.

xdm:cardsDetails.title: Loyalty Cards Details

xdm:number.title: Card Number
xdm:number.description: The loyalty card number or identifier.

xdm:series.title: Card Series
xdm:series.description: The series or collection the loyalty card belongs to.

xdm:status.title: Card Status
xdm:status.description: Current status of the loyalty card (active, inactive, suspended, etc.).

xdm:cardsDetails.description: Details about the user's loyalty cards, if any.

xdm:challenges.title: Loyalty Challenges

xdm:description.title: Challenge Description
xdm:description.description: Detailed description of the loyalty challenge or campaign.

xdm:endDate.title: Challenge End Date
xdm:endDate.description: End date and time of the loyalty challenge.

xdm:frequencyType.title: Frequency Type
xdm:frequencyType.description: Type of frequency for the challenge (daily, weekly, monthly, etc.).

xdm:id.title: Challenge ID
xdm:id.description: Unique identifier for the loyalty challenge.

xdm:name.title: Challenge Name
xdm:name.description: Name or title of the loyalty challenge.

xdm:series.title: Challenge Series
xdm:series.description: Series or collection the challenge belongs to.

xdm:startDate.title: Challenge Start Date
xdm:startDate.description: Start date and time of the loyalty challenge.

xdm:status.title: Challenge Status
xdm:status.description: Current status of the challenge (active, completed, expired, etc.).

xdm:tasks.title: Challenge Tasks

xdm:endDate.title: Task End Date
xdm:endDate.description: End date and time for the challenge task.

xdm:entity.title: Task Entity
xdm:entity.description: Entity or object the task is related to.

xdm:goal.title: Task Goal
xdm:goal.description: Target goal value for the challenge task.

xdm:name.title: Task Name
xdm:name.description: Name or description of the specific task.

xdm:progress.title: Task Progress
xdm:progress.description: Current progress value toward the task goal.

xdm:startDate.title: Task Start Date
xdm:startDate.description: Start date and time for the challenge task.

xdm:status.title: Task Status
xdm:status.description: Current status of the task (in progress, completed, failed, etc.).

xdm:type.title: Task Type
xdm:type.description: Type or category of the challenge task.

xdm:tasks.description: Details about the specific tasks within the loyalty challenge.

xdm:challenges.description: Loyalty challenges or campaigns the customer is participating in.

xdm:expiredPoints.title: Expired Points
xdm:expiredPoints.description: Total number of points that have expired and are no longer available for use.

xdm:lifetimePoints.title: Lifetime Points
xdm:lifetimePoints.description: Total points earned by the customer throughout their entire loyalty program membership.

xdm:lifetimePurchases.title: Lifetime Purchases
xdm:lifetimePurchases.description: Total monetary value of all purchases made by the customer throughout their loyalty program membership.

xdm:promisedPoints.title: Promised Points
xdm:promisedPoints.description: Points that have been promised but not yet credited to the customer's account.

xdm:returnedPoints.title: Returned Points
xdm:returnedPoints.description: Points that have been returned to the customer's account due to refunds or adjustments.

xdm:rewards.title: Loyalty Rewards
xdm:rewards.description: Various types of rewards available to the customer through the loyalty program.

xdm:endDate.description: Date when the badge expires or becomes invalid.

xdm:id.title: Badge ID
xdm:id.description: Unique identifier for the achievement badge.

xdm:name.title: Badge Name
xdm:name.description: Name or title of the achievement badge.

xdm:series.description: Series or collection the badge belongs to.

xdm:startDate.description: Date when the badge was awarded or became active.

xdm:status.title: Badge Status
xdm:status.description: Current status of the badge (active, expired, revoked, etc.).

xdm:badges.description: Achievement badges earned by the customer through various activities.

xdm:series.description: Series or campaign the coupon belongs to.

xdm:startDate.description: Date when the coupon becomes valid for use.

xdm:status.description: Current status of the coupon (active, expired, redeemed, etc.).

xdm:storeName.description: Name of the store where the coupon can be used.

xdm:status.description: Current status of the giveaway (active, ended, won, etc.).

xdm:id.description: Unique identifier for the referral reward.

xdm:name.description: Name or description of the referral reward.

xdm:startDate.description: Start date of the referral reward period.

xdm:status.description: Current status of the referral (pending, completed, expired, etc.).
